level.heading: EDUCATION, TRAINING, AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS FOR RECREATION THERAPISTS (ยง7-7202)

level.text: An applicant for registration to practice as a recreation therapist may meet the education, training, and experience requirements by furnishing to the Director satisfactory proof that the applicant has been certified by the National Council for Therapeutic Recreation Certification (NCTRC) at the professional level of Certified Therapeutic Recreation Specialist.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 5953 (August 19, 1994); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8931 (September 14, 2007).
